pageProduct.name: Panadol Children Chewable Tablets 3 Years+ 24 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Panadol Children 3+ Years Chewable Cherry Flavour is effective temporary relief of fever and pain associated with teething, immunisation, earache, headache, cold & flu symptoms.

Panadol Children 3+ Years Chewable Cherry Flavour is effective temporary relief of fever and pain associated with:

  • Teething
  • Immunisation
  • Earache
  • Headache
  • Cold & Flu symptoms
What's the format?
 

Chewable Tablet
A small disc of a compressed solid substance (typically a measured amount of a medicine). Chewable tablets do not require water, and will dissolve in your mouth.

What are its features?

Tablet can be dissolved in the mouth without the need for water.
Other features:
  • Good for travelling
  • Sugar free
  • Gentle to little stomachs
  • Contains paracetamol

What are the ingredients?
Active ingredient: 120mg of Paracetamol per tablet

How to use
Place tablet in mouth, and  either chew or leave to dissolve in the mouth.

Boxed Contents: 24 chewable tablets.

Size: 24 Tablets

Warnings

Do not use this medicine.
- If your child is using other medicines containing paracetamol, except on medical advice.
- For more than 48 hours. except on medical advice.
- If any of the seals on this packaging are broken.
- If the package use-by date has expired.
- Until you read the enclosed leaflet carefully.

Ask a doctor before use if your child.
- Has liver or kidney problems.
- Weighs less than 14 kg or more than 41 kg.

Stop use and see your doctor if your child has an allergic skin reaction, shortness of breath or wheezing after taking this medicine.

While using this product.
If an overdose is taken or suspected, ring the Poisons Information Centre (AUST: 13 11 26) or go to the hospital immediately, even if you feel well because of the risk of delayed, serious liver damage if left untreated. Keep to the recommended dose.

CAUTION

Keep out of reach of children.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Pharmacy medicine.

Ingredients

Saccharin, 6.4g of mannitol per 20 tablets (which may have a laxative effect or cause diarrhoea).

No preservatives, aspirin, lactose or gluten.

Active Ingredients: Each tablet contains Paracetamol 120mg.

Contains: Saccharin, 6.4g of mannitol per 20 tablets (which may have a laxative effect or cause diarrhoea).

No preservatives, aspirin, lactose or gluten.

Allergen Free From: Artificial Preservatives| Gluten| Lactose

Directions

- Please read and retain the carton.
- Measure the correct dose based on the dosage table below.
- Calculate the correct dose based on the child's weight. If weight is unknown, use the child's age.

Age: 3 - 6 yrs
Average Weight: 14 - 20kg
Dose: 2 tablets (max 8 in 24 hrs).

Age: 6 - 9 yrs
Average Weight: 20 - 28kg
Dose: 3 tablets (max 12 in 24 hrs).

Age: 9 - 11 yrs
Average Weight: 28 - 36kg
Dose: 4 tablets (max 16 in 24 hrs).

Age: 11 - 12 yrs
Average Weight: 36 - 41kg
Dose: 5 tablets (max 20 in 24 hrs).

Repeat 4 - 6 hourly if required (maximum 4 times within 24 hours).
Taste is improved if the tablet is not chewed but simply dissolved in the mouth.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C. Protect from moisture. Do not refrigerate.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C.
